properties.areaDesc: Greene, GA; Oconee, GA; Clarke, GA
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 5 at 6:35AM EST until January 6 at 9:24AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Oconee River near Penfield.
* From this morning until Monday morning.
* At 6 AM Sunday the stage was 12.5 feet...and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 13 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by late this morning and
continue to rise to near 13.4 feet by this evening. The river will
fall below flood stage by early Monday morning.
* At 13 feet...Flood Stage is reached. Minor flooding occurs along
the river upstream and downstream from the gage on the Georgia
Highway 15 bridge. The right bank begins to overflow into
agricultural land and pastures with a foot or two of water.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
